short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Surf the web. Earn rewards. Train AI. All with Spider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Become a Web Weaver: Build the Future of AI with Every Click (Spider Chrome Extension)
Turn your everyday browsing into a superpower!

Introducing Spider: The revolutionary Chrome extension that makes you a Web Weaver, shaping the future of AI with each website you visit.

Here's how you weave the future:

Effortless Contribution: Install Spider with a single click. Your anonymized browsing behavior (think frequently visited sites, not private information) becomes a vital thread in the web of AI development.
Powering Progress: This anonymized data fuels the creation of a massive, diverse dataset for AI. This dataset unlocks possibilities for groundbreaking AI solutions across healthcare, climate change, and more.
Future-Proof Rewards: Be an early adopter! In the near future, earn $WEB tokens for your browsing contributions. These tokens unlock exclusive features within the Spider ecosystem (coming soon!).
Why Choose Spider?

Be a Web Weaver: Become a part of something bigger, shaping the future of AI with every click.
Privacy First: We prioritize your security. Your data is anonymized and completely under your control. Choose what's shared and opt-out anytime.
Effortless Impact: Simply browse, no technical expertise needed. Let your everyday actions create a ripple effect.
Feature-Rich:
Selective Sharing: Choose which browsing data contributes to the AI dataset.
Impact Dashboard: Visualize the impact of your browsing on AI development. (Add more features if applicable)
Join a Thriving Community: Connect with fellow Web Weavers and be part of a movement shaping the future.
